text:
博覧強記で知れ渡る往生堂の客卿、璃月の民からの信頼も厚い鍾離と、悪逆非道で知れ渡るファデュイの執行官第十一位、璃月で最も嫌われている者と言っても過言ではない青年、タルタリヤである。
仲睦まじい恋人同士でありながら、璃月内での評価が綺麗に正反対の二人は、現在深刻な意見の相違に見舞われていた。 お付き合いを初めてからのち、彼らはなんだかんだ比較的順調に交際を続けていたので、ここまでの膠着状態に陥るのは初めてと言ってもいいほどだ。
trans:
Zhongli, a guest advisor of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor renowned for his vast knowledge, is deeply trusted by the people of Liyue. On the other hand, Tartaglia, the Eleventh Fatui Harbinger, infamous for his malevolence, is arguably the most hated man in Liyue.
Despite being a loving couple, their reputations within Liyue are starkly opposite. Currently, the two find themselves facing a serious disagreement. Since they began their relationship, things had been relatively smooth despite ups and downs, making this the first time they have been at such a standstill.
